Key Match Events: Thompson struggled the rest of the way in the first quarter
Thompson hit two 3-pointers and added another assist and three rebounds as Dallas went into halftime with a 63-59 advantage
Thompson had 11 points in the final 24 minutes
Steph Curry scored 10 points and spoiled Thompson's homecoming in the final three minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Golden State Warriors employees welcomed Thompson with the captain's hat
The Warriors gave Thompson a video tribute and a standing ovation
Post-Match Reflections: Thompson's former co-stars, Steph Curry and Draymond Green, seemed to have an edge to their games
Thompson caught fire in the third quarter, helping the Mavericks turn around a first-quarter deficit
Thompson continued to perform well in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thompson got the foul on his old backcourt running partner, scoring his first points as an opponent against the Dubs
Thompson hit a 3 and added an assist to finish the first quarter with five points
Thompson shot 6 of 12 from the 3-point range
